ffmpegPrefsIni:
[Version]
Version=4

[WebM HD 3600 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 6400k -b:v 3200k -crf  10 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=1280
maxHeight=720
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 3200k -b:v 1600k -crf  15 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 96k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"

maxHeight=576
